thread.title: Oof: Dave Rubin Makes Claim That Jesus "Was Around A Lot of Muslims" Because He Was In The Middle East - Christine Rousselle
thread.title_full: Oof: Dave Rubin Makes Claim That Jesus "Was Around A Lot of Muslims" Because He Was In The Middle East - Christine Rousselle

author: Christine Rousselle
title: Oof: Dave Rubin Makes Claim That Jesus "Was Around A Lot of Muslims" Because He Was In The Middle East - Christine Rousselle
text:
Share Tweet 
Dave Rubin of The Rubin Report may want to pick up a history book before trying to make claims about who Jesus Christ hung around with or would have approved of. In a rather hilarious clip, Rubin, speaking with comedian Trae Crowder, made the curious claim that Jesus hung around with a lot of Muslims, because he was in the Middle East. . @RubinReport on Jesus: "He was around a lot of Muslims. It was the Middle East." pic.twitter.com/kTrqKmcvWz â€” Sam Sholli (@Sam_Sholli) February 18, 2017 
Islam, of course, wasn't founded until the early seventh century. It would have been quite hard for Jesus to have hung around with Muslims, given that they did not exist yet.
